summary:
Dibella has chosen a few mortals which should be granted immense beauty. These mortals happen to be the women of Skyrim.

Now fully nude, modelled genitalia, TBBP (HDT) support and a new crisp 4096x4096 texture. Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
[size=200][center]UPDATES[/center][/size]
[b]Version 1.2[/b]
[list]
[*]Fixes corrupted vertex order in the femalebody_1.nif from version 1.1 (removed messy "spikes")
[/list]

[b]Version 1.1[/b]
[list]
[*]Fixes major error in the vertex weighting (fixes all "holes" in the mesh)
[/list]

[b]Version 1.0[/b]
[list]
[*]Initial Release
[/list]


[i][center]"Dibella has chosen a few mortals which should be granted immense beauty. These mortals happen to be the women of Skyrim."[/center][/i]

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53316-1-1398262578.png[/img][/center]

[center][size=200][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/size][/center]

Dibella has blessed the women of Skyrim with a athletic but sinful body to survive in these harsh times.

This is a very curvy and voluptous custom body replacer for Skyrim. The body received a high amount of polygons to support the exaggerated curves, and the vertex weighting has gotten a lot of a love so the body will deform smoothly. The skin is quite smooth and very clean, so it isn't very immersive.

The original mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53135/?]"Touched by Dibella"[/url] contains armor conversions and themilkdrinker is working on completing all armors.

[center][size=200][b]FEATURES[/b][/size][/center]

[list]
[*]high quality body replacer with smooth curves
[*]hand crafted and high resolution texture with a lot of skin detail
[*]includes a custom head texture (slightly edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48329/?]"Real Skin" by nuska[/url])
[*]fully seamless*
[*]supports TBBP (HDT)
[*]patches to support custom races**
[*]easy-to-use "Nexus Mod Manager" installer
[/list]

[i]*as long as you use the default textures delivered, or used the seamfix PSDs i provided[/i]
[i]**current available patches: ethereal elven overhaul[/i]

[center][size=200][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/size][/center]

Just use the "Nexus Mod Manager" to install this mod. I have included a compatible installer script so you can install this mod comfortably.

If you crash on loading the body mod be sure you have [b]"XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended"[/b] (google it!) installed.

To use the "HDT Physics Extension" you.. sadly have to google. I'am not allowed to link this extension nor provide any information. Just google this keyword and you'll find along.

[center][color=red][u][b]IMPORTANT[/b][/u][/color][/center][color=red]

When you use HDT, put your HDT Configuration .xml (HDT Breast Physic and Collision) in [b]"../Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/"[/b] and name it [b]tbd.xml[/b]!

If you wont follow this instruction, HDT will NOT work![/color]

[center][size=200][b]DOs & DON'Ts[/b][/size][/center]

Obviously this mod will not work with any other body replacers. This mod also does not work with ANY texture mod out there - this body uses a different texture layout compared to other famous body replacers (CBBE, UNP, ..). My textures are the only one that will work with THIS body replacer.

[center][size=200][b]RECOMMENDED MODS[/b][/size][/center]
[i][center](recommended not required!)[/center][/i]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/]The Grim and Somber ENBS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/]TBBP animation of Dragonfly[/url]
sexy idle Animation by red3113@3dm (google it!)
HDT Physics Extension (google it!)
HDT Breast Physic and Collision (google it!)

[center][size=200][b]CREDITS & PERMISSIONS[/b][/size][/center]

If you want to re-upload any of these files you don't have to ask me (urgarulga) for permission - just be sure to credit me and link this page! All other assets don't need any permission, as long as you do credit the authors.

[center]urgarulga - modifying mesh, vertex skinning, new textures[/center]
[center]themilkdrinker - original mesh and textures[/center]
[center]Leito86 - mesh for the labia minora[/center]
[center]nuska - face texture resource[/center]
[center]Phygit - FemFeet mesh[/center]
[center]MrTroubleMaker - high quality hand mesh[/center]
[center]dimon99 - hand texture resource[/center]
[center]LeCid and xp32 - skeleton (tbbp)[/center]
author: urgarulga
